title: Fantastic NON-fiction Book Group: The Book of Hope - A Survival Guide for Trying Times
description:
The Book of Hope:  A Survival Guide for Trying Times

by Jane Goodall

In this urgent book, Jane Goodall, the world's most famous living naturalist and Doug Abrams, internationally-bestselling author, explore--through intimate and thought-provoking dialogue--one of the most sought after and least understood elements of human nature: hope.  Filled with engaging dialogue and pictures from Jane’s storied career, The Book of Hope is a deeply personal conversation with one of the most beloved figures in today’s world.

Join us in the Campbell Room to discuss this month's title.  Attendance is free and registration is required. 

 

Can’t make it in person?  You can also attend via Zoom!  A link will be sent to all participants the day of the meeting so you can choose what works best for you.

 

A limited number of copies of each title are available for checkout.

title: Pickup Service
description:
Let's get these items to you!

After you have received your notification to schedule a pickup for your requested item(s), fill out the form to select a date to come just inside the North Entrance doors, and collect your item(s) from the pickup table.  If you are you picking up for someone else, please include their name(s) and library card number(s).

Pickup Service is available from 10:00 a.m. - 8:30 p.m. Monday - Thursday and 10:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. Friday and Saturday.  Pickup Service is not currently available on Sundays.

More information, including step by step instructions on how to place holds on items within the library catalog and the location where you pick up your items, can be found at: www.salinapubliclibrary.org/pickup

title: Take and Make Crafts: Book Page Flowers
description:
Paper flowers can be a gorgeous addition to any table, especially when they are covered with words! This craft uses weeded book pages to create beautiful roses. Follow along with Ashleigh Lauren on Youtube to get creating!

Registration Required. Supplies will be available for pickup between 10 a.m. and 6 p.m.
